ATHENA_MITX_ENROLLMENTS_TABLE.description: Table name for Athena mitx enrollments

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key for S3 storage.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 storage.

BLOCKLISTED_COURSES_URL.description: URL of a text file containing blocklisted course ids

DUPLICATE_COURSES_URL.description: URL of a text file containing course ids that are duplicates of each other

CELERY_WORKER_MAX_MEMORY_PER_CHILD.description: Max memory to be used by celery worker child

CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: A list of origins that are authorized to make cross-site HTTP requests

CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGIN_REGEXES.description: A list of regexes that match origins that are authorized to make cross-site HTTP requests

EDX_API_ACCESS_TOKEN_URL.description: URL to retrieve a MITx access token

EDX_API_URL.description: URL to retrieve MITx course data from

EDX_API_CLIENT_ID.description: EdX client id to access the MITx course catalog API

EDX_API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: EdX secret key to access the MITx course catalog API

EDX_LEARNING_COURSE_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of the bucket with course run tar archives for MITx

EDX_LEARNING_COURSE_BUCKET_PREFIX.description: S3 prefix for MITx bucket keys

ELASTICSEARCH_HTTP_AUTH.description: Basic auth settings for connecting to Elasticsearch

ELASTICSEARCH_CONNECTIONS_PER_NODE.description: The size of the connection pool created for each node detected within an ElasticSearch cluster.

ELASTICSEARCH_SHARD_COUNT.description: Number of shards to allocate when creating an Elasticsearch index. Generally set to the CPU count of an individual node in the cluster.

ELASTICSEARC_REPLICA_COUNT.description: Number of index replicas to create when initializing a new Elasticsearch index. Generally set to the number of search nodes available in the cluster.

ELASTICSEARCH_INDEXING_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Chunk size to use for Elasticsearch indexing tasks

ELASTICSEARCH_DOCUMENT_INDEXING_CHUNK_SI.description: Chunk size to use for Elasticsearch course document indexing

ELASTICSEARCH_MAX_SUGGEST_HITS.description: Return suggested search terms only if the number of hits is equal to or below this value

ELASTICSEARCH_MAX_SUGGEST_RESULTS.description: The maximum number of search term suggestions to return

ELASTICSEARCH_MIN_QUERY_SIZE.description: Minimimum number of characters in a query string to search for

ELASTICSEARCH_URL.description: URL for connecting to Elasticsearch cluster

ENABLE_INFINITE_CORRIDOR.description: Boolean indicating whether infinite corridor is enabled

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for the Github API

IMAGEKIT_CACHEFILE_DIR.description: Prefix path for cached images generated by imagekit

INDEXING_ERROR_RETRIES.description: Number of times to retry an indexing operation on failure

LEARNING_COURSE_ITERATOR_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Chunk size for iterating over xPRO/MITx Online courses for master json

MAILGUN_URL.description: The URL for communicating with Mailgun

MAILGUN_KEY.description: The token for authenticating against the Mailgun API

MAILGUN_BCC_TO_EMAIL.description: Email address used with bcc email

MAILGUN_SENDER_DOMAIN.description: Domain used for emails sent via mailgun

MAX_S3_GET_ITERATIONS.description: Max retry attempts to get an S3 object

MITPE_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for MIT Professional Education website

MITX_ALT_URL.description: Base alternate URL for MITx courses

MITX_BASE_URL.description: Base default URL for MITx courses hosted on edX

MITX_ONLINE_BASE_URL.description: Base default URL for MITx Online courses

MITX_ONLINE_PROGRAMS_API_URL.description: The catalog url for MITx Online programs

MITX_ONLINE_COURSES_API_URL.description: The api url for MITx Online courses

MITX_ONLINE_LEARNING_COURSE_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload MITx Online course media

MIT_WS_PRIVATE_KEY.description: X509 private key as a string

OCW_CONTENT_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of S3 bucket containing OCW course data

OCW_ITERATOR_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Chunk size for iterating over OCW courses for master json

OCW_LEARNING_COURSE_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload OCW course media

OCW_NEXT_SEARCH_WEBHOOK_KEY.description: Authentication parameter value that should be passed in a webhook

OCW_UPLOAD_IMAGE_ONLY.description: Upload course image only instead of all OCW files

OCW_WEBHOOK_DELAY.description: Delay in seconds to process an OCW course after receiving webhook

OCW_WEBHOOK_KEY.description: Authentication parameter value that should be passed in a webhook

OLL_ALT_URL.description: Base alternate URL for OLL courses

OLL_API_ACCESS_TOKEN_URL.description: URL to retrieve a OLL access token

OLL_API_URL.description: URL to retrieve OLL course data from

OLL_API_CLIENT_ID.description: Openedx client id to access the OLL course catalog API

OLL_API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Openedx secret key to access the OLL course catalog API

OLL_BASE_URL.description: Base default URL for OLL courses

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_BASE_URL.description: Base url to link users to in emails

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_CHANNEL_POST_LIMIT.description: Number of posts to display on the frontpage and channels

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_COOKIE_NAME.description: Name of the cookie for the JWT auth token

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_COOKIE_DOMAIN.description: Domain for the cookie for the JWT auth token

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_DEFAULT_CHANNEL_BACKPOP.description: Number of users to sync per backpopulate batch

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_RELATED_POST_COUNT.description: Number of related posts to fetch

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_ENVIRONMENT.description: The execution environment that the app is in (e.g. dev, staging, prod)

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_FROM_EMAIL.description: E-mail to use for the from field

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_FRONTPAGE_DIGEST_MAX_EP.description: Max podcast episodes in open digest emails

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_FRONTPAGE_DIGEST_MAX_PO.description: Max posts in open digest emails

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_LOG_LEVEL.description: The log level for the application

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_HOT_POST_REPAIR_DELAY.description: How many second to wait until attempting to repair a missing post

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_HOT_POST_REPAIR_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of posts in the history to check for a missing post

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_JWT_SECRET.description: Shared secret for JWT auth tokens

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_NOTIFICATION_ATTEMPT_RA.description: The per-worker rate limit at which to generate pending EmailNotification frontpage records

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_NOTIFICATION_ATTEMPT_CH.description: The size of each attempt batch

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_NOTIFICATION_SEND_CHUNK.description: The size of each sending batch

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_REDDIT_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for securing trusted APIs to reddit

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_REDDIT_CLIENT_ID.description: OAuth client ID for authentication with reddit

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_REDDIT_SECRET.description: OAuth secret for authentication with reddit

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_REDDIT_URL.description: URL including protocol to reddit host (e.g. https://reddit.local)

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_REDDIT_VALIDATE_SSL.description: If false, disables validation of Reddit's SSL certificate

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_SIMILAR_RESOURCES_COUNT.description: Number of similar resources to return

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_TITLE.description: Title of the open discussions site

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_TOS_URL.description: URL to the Terms of Service

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_SUPPORT_EMAIL.description: Email address listed for customer support

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_UNSUBSCRIBE_TOKEN_MAX_A.description: Maximum age of unsubscribe tokens in seconds

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_USE_S3.description: Use S3 for storage backend (required on Heroku)

OPEN_PODCAST_DATA_BRANCH.description: Branch in the open podcast data repository to use for podcast ingestion

OPEN_RESOURCES_MIN_DOC_FREQ.description: Elasticsearch min_doc_freq value for determining similar resources

OPEN_RESOURCES_MIN_TERM_FREQ.description: Elasticsearch min_term_freq value for determining similar resources

OPEN_VIDEO_DATA_BRANCH.description: Branch in the open video data repository to use for video downloads

OPEN_VIDEO_MAX_TOPICS.description: Maximum number of topics to assign a video

OPEN_VIDEO_MIN_DOC_FREQ.description: Elasticsearch min_doc_freq value for determing video topics

OPEN_VIDEO_MIN_TERM_FREQ.description: Elasticsearch min_term_freq value for determing video topics

OPEN_VIDEO_USER_LIST_OWNER.description: User who will own user lists generated from playlists

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: If false, disables the node_modules cache to fix yarn install

PODCAST_FETCH_SCHEDULE_SECONDS.description: The time in seconds between periodic syncs of podcasts

PROLEARN_CATALOG_API_URL.description: Base URL for the Prolearn search API

RSS_FEED_EPISODE_LIMIT.description: Number of episodes included in aggregated rss feed

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_SP_PUBLIC_CERT.description: SAML Service Provider x509 public certificate string

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_SP_PRIVATE_KEY.description: SAML Service Provider x509 private key

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_ORG_DISPLAYNAME.description: SAML Service Provider organization display name

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_CONTACT_NAME.description: SAML Service Provider technical/support contact name

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_SECURITY_ENCRYPTED.description: Require encrypted assertions for SAML Service Provider

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_X509.description: SAML Identity Provider X509 certificate string

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_ATTRIBUTE_PERM_ID.description: SAML Identity Provider attribute for user permanent id

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_ATTRIBUTE_NAME.description: SAML Identity Provider attribute for user name

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_ATTRIBUTE_EMAIL.description: SAML Identity Provider attribute for user email

SEE_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for Sloan Executive Education

SPAM_EXEMPT_EMAILS.description: list of email regex patterns that are exempt from spam checking

STAFF_MOIRA_LISTS.description: moira lists of users who can create public lists

STATUS_TOKEN.description: Token to access the status API.

TIKA_CLIENT_ONLY.description: use tika-python library in client mode

TIKA_SERVER_ENDPOINT.description: URL of tika server for extracting text

CKEDITOR_ENVIRONMENT_ID.description: env ID for CKEditor EasyImage auth

CKEDITOR_SECRET_KEY.description: secret key for CKEditor EasyImage auth

XPRO_CATALOG_API_URL.description: The catalog url for xpro programs

XPRO_COURSES_API_URL.description: The api url for xpro courses

XPRO_LEARNING_COURSE_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload xPRO course media

YOUTUBE_DEVELOPER_KEY.description: The key to the google youtube api

YOUTUBE_FETCH_SCHEDULE_SECONDS.description: The time in seconds between periodic syncs of youtube videos

YOUTUBE_FETCH_TRANSCRIPT_SCHEDULE_SECOND.description: The time in seconds between periodic syncs of youtube video transcripts

YOUTUBE_FETCH_TRANSCRIPT_SLEEP_SECONDS.description: Sleep time between requests to the youtube transcripts api
